website_summaries.verdict: If your kit is intact, chances are you will be impressed with the quality of these feathers that come in pretty colors that pair nicely together.
pros: Comes with an assortment of vibrantly colored brown and turquoise natural feathers that complement western and denim fashions
Lengths range from 8 inches to 11 inches
Kit includes beads and loop tool
Will last many months with proper care
cons: Some quality control concerns including torn packaging, creased, or missing feathers

customer_reviews.title: 😊😍😁
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo pleased with this purchase. The package shows exactly what I got. Mostly natural colored feathers which look like a lot like low/high lights but extra plus 4/5 teal feathers for a pop. At first I thought I would have to have someone put them in for me, but after reading the directions i decided to give it a try myself. It comes with the beads and a threading loop and was really easy. All you need is needle nose pliers. If you don’t have any, I really bet you could clamp that bead with a decent pair of tweezers. I am more than happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.

customer_reviews.title: Lazy review posts...
customer_reviews.text: May look like a larger bundle in the pictures but it 'clearly' states there are "20" feathers in an order! Not a fan of negative review posts from people that are too lazy to read the entirety of the products info but quick to take the time to post an ignorant comment/ review. I'm very happy with the product! Great quality and beautiful variety! Will be ordering more as my friends and family think they need a couple in their hair now too. ;) Also, when installed properly with the correct end of the feather(s) in the bead, and crimped to the angle of the scalp, they have stayed in just fine and for weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: windy a.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to add a pop of color to my hair without the maintenance and cost issue so this was the perfect fix. My hairdresser loved the look and decided to order some for herself and clients asap. The only reason why this gets 4 stars instead of 5 is a packaging issue. The are packaged (neatly) in a small ziploc. However because the ziploc is small it caused creases in the feathers. It's not a huge deal because you can straighten them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Variety is my only issue.
customer_reviews.text: I got 5 colors. 4 of each color. I would have been more satisfied if I had received a bit more variety. Like a cream colored one or the reddish copper looking ones as shown in advertisement. I got too much brown for my liking. Shortest was 9", longest was 13". Overall, I like them, I just feel that you should get at least one of each color shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amber O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: The feathers are cute and durable! I’ve put them through the wringer this summer with backpacking and river trips, swimming in pools or snorkeling in the ocean, and with near constant exposure to harsh elements. They’re doing great still! They don’t hold a curl particularly well but they’re lightweight enough that they follow the lead of what the hair around them is doing. I’m so happy with these! I’ve only used the black/white and turquoise feathers (I have six in my hair currently that have been in place for a month and a half) so I can’t attest to this same durability for the mahogany shades however I assume they’re the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These feathers are so cute! They are not very big, but you don't need them to be big. I used 3 in my hair, 3 in one of my daughters hair and two in my other daughters hair and there are plenty left. They are super easy to install and remove. I will definitely buy them again. I also curled mine with my hair and it was cute and curled just fine. Washed and brushed my hair just fine and braided the feathers into my daughters hair and the feathers were curled like when you take a braid out. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Shana_rai

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good quality
customer_reviews.text: The feathers are great. Love them in my hair. They're a little thinner in person than in the picture but the colors are wonderful and the texture and sturdiness holds up so far. I've had mine in for about a week and tugged on by a 4 year old and they don't look like they're going anywhere anytime soon. I particularly appreciated that the directions for how to install the feathers were emailed to me prior to the package arriving. Overall, I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burke

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I think mine have been in for over two weeks now and they're still hanging on! I've never put extensions in before and these were easy! I wash, brush, blow dry and curling iron my hair daily! I love that these curl with my hair! I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D

customer_reviews.title: Is ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Because the bead that you pinch is kind of thick and bulky it does not work well for fine/thin hair. The bead stayes in the hair without an issue however the feathers can pull out if you are not pretty careful. I would actually wear them if the bead was much smaller and thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kari W.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put in. Haven’t used any heat on them yet or washed them but I’ll update it when I do! So far I couldn’t be happier with the look.
customer_reviews.author: MadelineWHB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but thin
customer_reviews.text: The feathers were pretty but several were smaller than expected. We were short two but when I contacted the seller they sent out 5 instead of just the 2.
customer_reviews.author: kahlanne

customer_reviews.title: White hair doesn't have to be boring
customer_reviews.text: I am an octogenarian with white hair...I thought it looked boring so had my hair stylist put in three small bunches of blue and brown feathers+. I could blow dry it and brush it. Doesn't hurt my hair. Lots of compliments. One started coming out in a month so I used some of the rest of the feathers to take their place.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine A. Block

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty use them all at once if you want them to show they are not very wide or long. Holds up very well. I wash mine along with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anomg

customer_reviews.title: Add Flair
customer_reviews.text: Add flair to your hair without dying it... i love this and so easy and I keep them in for a while and wash my hair with them in there.
customer_reviews.author: David Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for at home feathers
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. The color is similar to that in the picture. Kit includes everything except small pliers to squeeze bead to hold feather in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $5 worth of feathers for $25
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The picture makes you think you could get 20 extensions but it’s only 20 very thin feathers. You could get maybe 2-3 extensions. I don’t understand why they wouldn’t include more feathers for the price. Just not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: FEATHERS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to actually do it, they are fairly simple to put in. Just wish you could get more variety... i LOOOOVE the copper/red feathers, BUT I’d like to get more of the cream or striped ones too. OVERALL, I’m pretty satisfied and will likely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Kylea

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I only received 17 feathers and half of them were really thin like too thin. I was dissapointed I didn't get the full 20 and I have to put 3 in the same spot to even be noticable because they're so thin.
customer_reviews.author: heather piedel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! So soft and pretty. I put 6 in my hair right after installing keratin bead extensions. Would do it all over again. May order again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and length. Easy to put in . Feathers hold colors even after quite a few shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I got 17 beautiful feathers
customer_reviews.text: I got 17 beautiful feathers, not 20, 17. But the were beautiful looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sassone

customer_reviews.title: Love this company
customer_reviews.text: Love this company. They sell beautiful and quality feathers. These brown and and turquoise feathers are perfect all year round! Will be buying more fun colors soon for my daughter and nieces. Thank you for your wonderful service:)
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Ovitt

customer_reviews.title: Love these feathers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They make for such a fun hairstyle! They keep they’re color very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and was just as expected. We contemplated ordering bright colored versus the natural/turquoise mix but our package had mostly turquoise which is perfect. The kit is ready to use, you will need pliers as it doesn't come with any, I will definitely purchase again for birthday parties, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in! Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. I love feathers in my hair during summer time! The little tool it comes with makes it easy to put in your hair. And if you take care of them, they will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Allie ODaniel

customer_reviews.title: Feathers are a girls hair best friend
customer_reviews.text: They make your hair pop ladies or gents get the feathers are so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Nya Bella

customer_reviews.title: 20 feathers is a lie!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT a good value! So sad because i own a salon and buy feathers all the time. I decide to try these out because of Prime! Feathers are tiny, short and there is just not many in a pack! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Depot Salon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Super easy to use! It took a lot of trial and error to finally figure out where to put them so that I could see them but the bead would be concealed.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Foster

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are so small. My phone make them look "good". Impossible to use just two colors..Natural Hand dyed???
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Great feathers!
customer_reviews.text: Love! So easy to put in! Great colors! I’ve used them over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: For these for my almost 5 year old daughter. They were easy to install and remove, so much so we did it on day before leaving for daycare! Our mornings are typically rushed but this was quick and simple enough. P.S. she loves her feathers!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna R Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Not quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the feathers is just not the best, they start to fray after a couple days of use and no heat. They did not come with an instructions card on how to install them into the hair. Overall will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hairdresser and was really looking forward to using this on clients. At that price though, it’s only enough for one head of hair...maybe 2....I find the pictures extremely misleading and I might just return them. There are no red ones like in the picture either. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Moreau

customer_reviews.title: 10 feathers
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have come with more feathers than it did. It only came with about 10 feathers. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pettyjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted feathers since they are back in now. These were easy to put in and after wearing for a week, swimming and washing our hair they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I want a refund
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy. But cheap for how much I spent. Quality should have been so much better for that expensive price!!! I think it’s a waste of money. If I buy feathers again. I’ll do more research so this doesn’t happen again
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute!! Easy to put in and take out. Nice little flair to the hair
customer_reviews.author: SAMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite thing. They are pretty easy to put in I would just recommend buying the clamp tool. It's makes it way easy. I love mine and even bought a second thing of them.
customer_reviews.author: MIRANDA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great seller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & I used to go to a hair salon to get these put in at $10 a pop. What a waste! This is the exact same product & the seller sent step by step instructions w pictures. They even emailed me to see if I needed help. Great quality & my daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive chunky feathers. These are beautiful, but pipe cleaner thin. They look like tiny ribbons In the hair. Was super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These feathers!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these feathers! So far they've lasted for 4 weeks through hair washing, drying and steam rollers. I've been careful when brushing so as not to pull one out and I expect them to last the next two weeks until my hair appointment. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lani Moore

customer_reviews.title: I accidentally used too much hair the first time and it was painful.
customer_reviews.text: Just be sure to use a small section of hair. I accidentally used too much hair the first time and it was painful.
customer_reviews.author: Arcane

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Love them! So easy to do, I put them in myself the night I got them. I initially got them to wear for the Electic Forest music festival, and I’ve since left them in. I’ve washed and styled my hair numerous times, braided, ponytail, straightened- you name it, it’s been done. No issues with the feathers. They look as good as they did the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! They are great quality and so worth the price. Easy to use and they hold up well in the hair. You can use heat also with no problems. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Knichols5

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have loved these for the beach! Great value for the cost and very easy to put in!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to put in my hair. I really like the colors and so far they have held up well in my hair. I've curled, straightend and washed these feathers many times. I've had them in my hair for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily difficult to place
customer_reviews.text: The feathers I have ordered in the pat from Etsy have a plastic wrap on top of feather. This enables feathers to be placed inside bead and secured. I cannot emphasize this enough. Also feathers were longer, cheaper and better quality
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Iadevaia

customer_reviews.title: Durable great Father’s Day never lose their color
customer_reviews.text: Oh my clients go crazy over these feathers their fun way to add a pop of color in
customer_reviews.author: Michelle branscombe

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the colors! They look amazing and are wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.author: MDawg

customer_reviews.title: No more going to the salon for feather extensions.
customer_reviews.text: Love these hair extensions I can leave them in for days without them slipping out of place. And, they are perfectly fine to wear in the shower, blowdry and curl. I used to pay $20 at a salon for these same extensions now I can do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Czarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Predip in extension glue let dry before attaching to hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denell Steele

customer_reviews.title: Horrible !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the photo one tiny bag of feathers and they are all brown. No turquoise or red or anything huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and came fast! They look really cute! 10/10 recommended! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Stanworth

customer_reviews.title: I paid $4 to have these to me the next day and i’m Super disappointed i paid this much for the quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is false advertisement. You think you’re buying a lot more and it’s a lot LESS than you think. Very thin, not very long and doesn’t include the tool to tighten the bead. I paid $4 to have these to me the next day and i’m Super disappointed i paid this much for the quality and amount
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feathers hair extensions
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to receive my first feathers hair extensions. Thank you a lot. I will need get a tool to apply on my red hair. Will see it great !
customer_reviews.author: Judith Evanglina Acosta Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Only partial order arrived
customer_reviews.text: The feathers seem to be of decent quality, but the description of the product included a tool which we never received. Big disappointment. We will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and surprisingly durable!
customer_reviews.text: These stayed in so much better than I thought they would!
customer_reviews.author: Merry  Romo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and enough to split between multiple people. So much fun to do!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No disappointments
customer_reviews.text: I love my hair feathers! They are great and look so good. I was worried that you would be able to see the peice that attached to my hair but you can't. My hair is natural wavy but I striaghten it during the summer to calm the friz. The feathers blend in perfectly to my hair weather it is straight or wavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: The look of the feathers are as expected and as pictured. However, the amount that arrived (for the price) was not. Shop around. These should be priced at half of what I paid. ($27)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui O

customer_reviews.title: Feathers
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn’t realize 20 wasn’t that many when it came to feathers ! Most clients want more
customer_reviews.author: Julie Howell

customer_reviews.title: Love these! So much fun for a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So much fun for a bit of extra! Easy to use and stays in great! I even put some in my girlfriends hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 feathers for $25?
customer_reviews.text: My order came in the mail today and when I opened I was surprised to find only 5 feathers after the description said I would receive 20.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Make this right
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my feathers and they were mangled in in pieces when I open the package. I don't understand what happened but I am very upset about this.
customer_reviews.author: Meagen Bannen

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful accessory for my hair I have long hair putting ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful accessory for my hair I have long hair putting this one on My hair was so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: arshya

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not enough thicker ones.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. But a LOT of little, thin strands in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryd511

customer_reviews.title: Love my new hair feathers!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new hair feathers! Tricky to put on alone but easy with a friend. Wish the beads were smaller or a different attachment method available but overall I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: klem0129

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I would say, they are worth buying but you really need to watch a video on how to install them correctly. It doesn’t come with that much information.
customer_reviews.author: Makala

customer_reviews.title: Product serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Was under the impression it was more feathers enclosed. Still like the feathers
customer_reviews.author: naseem barnett

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like the picture. You would need at least 20 of these to make it look like the picture it’s small and skimpy
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and length. Easy to install. I really like having feathers in my hair :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Free

customer_reviews.title: Fun feathers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great variety and most were really long! Ordered two more packs a couple of days after these arrived! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McWhirter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are beautiful and look great in. Easy to style and give a little pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: amanda pack

customer_reviews.title: Bad colors
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality is good, it’s ashame we cannot choose colors. We got mostly browns which are not really pictured in display.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Natural looking and easy to use for adults. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie jones

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the feathers Easy to apply on the hair And colors are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Juliana L Pamplona

customer_reviews.title: ... swimming and working outside while wearing them for a good 2 weeks now
customer_reviews.text: I have thin blonde hair and have been swimming and working outside while wearing them for a good 2 weeks now. They are holding up surprisingly well. The blue ones might have gotten a bit faded after all the salt water and sun but they still look ok.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Conway

customer_reviews.title: Not much here.
customer_reviews.text: Package was about the size of my hand. I guess we were expecting something larger. Feathers are very little.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can use heat on them!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Easy to put in & they last. Stayed in while I washed my hair, & I’ve been been able to curl/straighten them!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey kutsch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Wish I had more blues and whites and less orange.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra pollard

customer_reviews.title: I love the feathers
customer_reviews.text: Love the product itself. They hold up extremely well. Would like longer and a Little wider feathers. I also would like tie dyed and more in a bulk than just 20.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, product exactly as stated and shown, pretty, love my feathers! Three in my hair that peek through every now and then, and some for my daughter's horse!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Image does not represent the product
customer_reviews.text: Should be multi colored it is not- I received all blue feathers
customer_reviews.author: LAFerrand

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the color of these feathers. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah Schock

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for this information I would like to request all pink and purple feathers please thank ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this information I would like to request all pink and purple feathers please thank you.tali.
customer_reviews.author: Tali pazz

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, I am a hairstylist and these are great and very popular. Withstands heat from tools, swimming pool and showers
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vega

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely short what a rip off I have long hair it would look so stupid do not buy
customer_reviews.author: gaylene

customer_reviews.title: Love my feathers
customer_reviews.text: Love my feathers. Colors are beautiful. I don't actually use the tool that was provided because I've always used a different way to get beads in my hair, so I can't say how that works. Feathers lasted in my hair several weeks before I put the same ones back in due to hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not all
customer_reviews.text: I only got 6 feathers . Love quality just didn’t get full amount
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Tha k you so much! Exactly what I was looking for. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Z Money

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved these...we did these for a birthday party!!! I will be ordering the "pink" soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great, love them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Comes with a variety - chose a few and put them in and saving the rest for later. Not sure how long they last but I sure do look good!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Agee

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun way to add a fun touch to your hair
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun way to add a fun touch to your hair , super easy and works even if you curl it with your hair
customer_reviews.author: aime gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in and they look really pretty! Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: emerald thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Love feathers, but this pack did not have a good variety.
customer_reviews.text: They look great! I've had many complements. The pack I received had too many multi colored feathers. The package only had a few of the solids and no reds :-(. I would have liked more of a variety.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: beautiful. I put all 20 in my hair and it still looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy my new feather extensions
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my new feather extensions. I had a little trouble putting them in, but only because I didn't have a good mirror. The instructions and installation are super easy. I will gladly purchase these again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Feathers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feathers! I watched a YouTube video to put them in my daughter's hair. Nice price Awesome product! I am not the best photographer...
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these feathers! They are great and adore every kind I've ordered! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Molly M. Shumar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the real deal. wish some were a bit wider. looks lovely in our hair, durable for months!
customer_reviews.author: GIna A.

product_meta.title: Feather Hair Extensions, 100% Real Rooster Feathers, Long Natural and Turquoise Blue Colors, 20 Feathers with Bonus FREE Beads and Loop Tool Kit NBT
product_meta.description: Feather hair extensions are a gorgeous way to spice up your hairstyle! Pack includes 20 feathers and mixed microlink beads for attaching. These feathers are 100% real authentic rooster saddle feathers from the USA. They are 8-11 inches long (20-28cm) and can be washed and heat styled. Feather Lily Feathers are used in salons around the USA and are of premium quality. These are a perfect gift for the girl in your life. Don't know what to get a teen or tween for their birthday? Popular and trendy hair feathers are the best present! Get some now and add flair to your hair!
feature_bullets: 20 Loose Feather Hair Extensions in Turquoise Natural Browns
Can be washed, styled, flat ironed, and curled with your natural hair
Salon Quality Feathers; Will last for months with proper care
Includes 20 beads and small loop tool kit for installation

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
